attributes.description: BB Group is a well-established Franchise with a wide variety. We strive to give excellent service. All Trade-ins are welcome. This is to ensure peace of mind for each of our Valued customers. For Excellent Service Contact our Sales Manager - Barend Conradie As part of a 60-year legacy, this fully fledged automotive dealer group offers New cars, Used Cars, Parts and service to all existing and potential customers.
